price: 82 Quiconque tournerait après cela le dos à cet engagement s’écarterait du droit chemin.
arabic: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: faman tawallā baʿda dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
